mapper.insert:
insert into dict
dict_code,
dict_type_name,
dict_name,
sort,
parent_id,
child_num,
dict_type,
status,

mapper.update:
update dict
dict_code = #{dictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_name = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
child_num = #{childNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dict_type = #{dictType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update dict set dict_code = #{dictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_name = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, child_num = #{childNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dict_type = #{dictType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) from dict where parent_id=#{value}
SELECT * FROM dict WHERE dict_code=#{dict_code} AND status=0

SELECT * FROM dict WHERE 1=1
and dict_name like concat('%',#{dictName},'%')
and dict_code=#{dictCode} AND status=0 order by sort desc
SELECT d.dict_name,d.id from dict d where id=#{VALUE}
SELECT d.dict_name from dict d WHERE dict_name=#{VALUE}
SELECT * FROM dict WHERE 1=1 AND dict_code='SJLX' AND STATUS=0 ORDER BY sort DESC LIMIT 0 ,1
SELECT dict_code AS dictCode, dict_type_name AS dictTypeName ,dict_name AS dictName,sort FROM dict WHERE dict_code=#{dictCode} AND sort=#{sort} AND status='0'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dict WHERE dict_code = #{dictCode} AND sort=#{sort} AND STATUS='0'
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM dict WHERE dict_code='SJLX' and status=0
AND sort=#{sort}
